Name: Zombie War
About the game: **** Zombie War: The War That Begins Released!!! **** Hot zombie battle with machine gun(M134), flamethrower, grenade. (FPS TPS Shooting game) ============================= - Strategic FPS TPS Shooting game to relieve stress - Even beginners can easily start the game at the training ground - Machine gun (M134), flamethrower, grenade, flash grenade added - Up to 2 remote allies (TCP/IP) 1. First, Go to Alience in the static IP server terminal and click [Listen]. 2. Go to Alience from another client terminal and click [Connect] to connect to a static IP and wait. 3. Click [Start] in the static IP server terminal. All features, including all weapons, are available!!! =========================== In 2024, an unknown virus has passed, Only zombies are infested on the peninsula. We got the information that a trillion gold bars were left somewhere in Yeouido. With various clues left everywhere hope you find that place.\nIf you go to a place where you can see the light, you will find the previous securement bases. Got guns and hospitals and convenience stores You can acquire weapons, heal, and recover health The helicopter can only go to the entrance due to electromagnetic interference.. please! I hope you find a trillion gold bars and come back alive... Good Luck!!!
